titleStmt.title: A briefe vnvailing of God and mans glory in which is 1. A briefe rehearsall of happinesse in generall, 2. How this happiness is manifested by Iesus Christ, 3. the soules song of love / by John Greene.
titleStmt.author: Greene, John, Master of Arts.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the British Library.
